title: Fragments, 17th–early 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread (narrow strips of gold and silver metallic foil wound onto silk core)
Technique: 7&1 satin patterned by weft floats and discontinuous supplementary wefts
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vives y Escudero
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 77.5 x 51.5 cm (30 1/2 x 20 1/4 in.)
description: Metallic scrolling stylized floral stems in a red satin foundation.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 17th–early 18th century.
17th–early 18th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread (narrow strips of gold and silver metallic foil wound onto silk core)
Technique: 7&1 satin patterned by weft floats and discontinuous supplementary wefts. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-407-a,b.
